title: Pixel OG Bluetooth not turning on
content:
For a few weeks now my bluetooth hasn't been turning on. I can switch it on, it'll try turning on and then automatically switches off.

It's been updated to the latest software update and it was working before and after the update. I cleared the cache, I've forced stop the bluetooth and restarted like a Google rep has instructed me. I finally factory reset the phone and it's still not working.

Has anyone else gone through this or seen an issue like this?
